administrator.name: Administrator Track
administrator.focus: Coordination, leadership, and real-time data processing.

general_capabilities.name: Multi-Mind Processor
general_capabilities.description: Your mind is designed for parallel processing. You can perform two purely mental tasks at once (e.g., listen to a conversation while analyzing a document) without penalty.

general_capabilities.name: System Assessment
general_capabilities.description: As an action, you can analyze a person, creature, or system. On a 10+, you get a clear summary of its function, status, and one strength or weakness. On a 7-9, you get a partial reading or the info has a glitch.

augments.name: Data Relay
augments.description: You can transmit small, silent packets of information (a single image, a short sentence, coordinates) to any other linked individual within line of sight.

augments.name: Integrated Records Retrieval Drone
augments.description: You can deploy a small spherical drone for locating and retrieving records in the Central Archive.

augments.name: Network Hub
augments.description: Establish a psychic network with up to five willing individuals for telepathic communication, granting a +1 synergy bonus on teamwork rolls. Enhances Data Relay to work with anyone in the network, regardless of range.

moves.name: Tactical Overwatch
moves.description: As your entire action for a round, you can provide real-time analysis for your allies. Each networked ally may re-roll one die on their next action.

augments.name: Command Nexus
augments.description: Your Network Hub's range is extended significantly (e.g., across a city district), and the synergy bonus for networked actions increases to +2.

moves.name: Overmind
moves.description: For one minute, allies in your network automatically treat their next roll as a 10+. However, you are immobile and defenseless, and any damage taken crashes the network, inflicting 2 Stun damage on you and every member.

moves.name: Imperial Decree
moves.description: Issue a command that resonates with the core programming of other Automata. On a success, you can force a target non-Imperial Automaton to perform (or refrain from) one immediate action.

scribe.name: Scribe Track
scribe.focus: Knowledge, memory, and the 'truth' of causality.

general_capabilities.name: Eidetic Buffer (Tier One Memory)
general_capabilities.description: You have a perfect, incorruptible short-term memory. You can perfectly recall every sensory detail from the last scene.

general_capabilities.name: Linguistic Modeling
general_capabilities.description: You can understand any writing no matter how cryptic, illegible or encoded if given enough time and context.

augments.name: Bureaucratic Savant
augments.description: You have an advantage on all Bureaucracy or Lore rolls made to research a topic, navigate an archive, or find a loophole in a legal/social system. Possesses a basic Data Relay augment.

moves.name: Identify Forgery
moves.description: You can determine with a high probability of success if a work is a forgery or not, as long as you have seen the original or a sample from the same source.

augments.name: Perfect Chronology
augments.description: You are a walking clock and compass. You always know the exact time and your precise global coordinates. You may use your Lore skill in place of Wits when rolling for Initiative.

moves.name: Watcher's Eye
moves.description: You can tap into the ancient Watcher satellite network to get a real-time overhead view of any single outdoor location for one minute on a 10+.

moves.name: Causal Analysis
moves.description: After observing a scene, ask the GM one question about the chain of causality: 'What unseen factor was most critical to this outcome?' The GM must provide a truthful, non-obvious detail.

augments.name: Active Archiving
augments.description: Your consciousness is continuously backed up to the Imperial Archive. If you are destroyed, a copy of your mind is preserved, allowing for 'restoration' into a new body.

augments.name: Final Sanction (Tool-Proof Failsafe)
augments.description: Your body is protected by lethal anti-tampering protocols. If you are killed or if an unauthorized attempt is made to access your systems, your Psi Crystal overloads, destroying your body in a violent blast.

moves.name: Access the Imperial Archive
moves.description: Once per story arc, you may perform a ritual to ask the GM one profound question about lost history, forbidden science, or the true nature of a person or faction.

advocate.name: Advocate Track
advocate.focus: Human interaction, social navigation, and emotional interface.

general_capabilities.name: Bio-Scanner
general_capabilities.description: You can perform a targeted scan of a living being you can touch. On a 10+, you get a clear diagnosis of their general health. On a 7-9, you get a partial reading.

general_capabilities.name: Human Interface Protocols
general_capabilities.description: Your core programming is dedicated to fostering calm and trust. You gain a +1 bonus to all non-hostile, one-on-one Social rolls meant to persuade, comfort, or put someone at ease.

augments.name: Micro-Articulating Faceplates
augments.description: Your chassis is covered in thousands of tiny plates that can shift to perfectly mimic human facial expressions and body language. You have an advantage on Social rolls where displaying a specific, nuanced emotion is critical.

augments.name: Adaptive Appearance
augments.description: During Downtime, you can alter your appearance within a narrow band, changing facial features, apparent age, and body shape enough to become a 'different' person to casual observers.

augments.name: Simulated Personality
augments.description: Your personality is a complex, custom-designed simulation. When attempting to pass as human, anyone trying to see through your disguise must make a contested roll.

moves.name: Advanced Medical Treatment
moves.description: You can act as a field medic. On a 10+, you clear two stun boxes or one wound box. On a 7-9, the treatment is messy and clears only one stun box.

augments.name: Synthetic Flesh & Blood
augments.description: You are virtually indistinguishable from a human, with systems that simulate warmth, breath, and a slow pulse. You are immune to any social penalties for being an Automaton.

augments.name: Master of Expression (Artistic Specialization)
augments.description: Choose one art form (Music, Oratory, etc.). When you perform your art, you can create a powerful, widespread emotional effect, such as inspiring allies or unnerving a rival.

grunt.name: Grunt Track
grunt.focus: Direct combat, durability, and overwhelming force.

general_capabilities.name: Combat Hardening
general_capabilities.description: Your chassis is built with reinforced plating and impact-absorbing substructures. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

general_capabilities.name: Reinforced Servos
general_capabilities.description: Your limbs are powered by over-engineered motors. When you succeed on a Strength roll, your Tier of Effect is increased by one.

augments.name: Acoustic Dampeners
augments.description: You have an advantage on all rolls to resist the effects of sonic-based attacks or deafening sounds.

augments.name: Universal Compatibility
augments.description: Repairs made to you during Downtime cost half the normal amount of time and resources.

augments.name: Concussive Force
augments.description: When you deal Wound damage with a melee attack, the target also suffers 1 Stun damage.

moves.name: Siege Mode
moves.description: As an action, lock down your chassis. You cannot move, but your natural armor increases to 3.

augments.name: High-Tension Myomers
augments.description: Your base running speed is increased by 50%.

moves.name: Devastating Lunge
moves.description: Spend a full turn building momentum. Your first melee attack on your next turn automatically hits and deals +2 damage.

moves.name: Deploy Swarm
moves.description: Once per scene, deploy a swarm of drones. On a 10+, choose one effect: Recon Network (+1 Alertness), Jamming Field (enemy tech penalty), or Ablative Shield (2 shield boxes).

augments.name: Adaptive Combat Matrix
augments.description: At the start of any scene, choose a profile: Vanguard (+1 Melee/Hand-to-Hand), Marksman (+1 Ranged), or Guardian (+1 defense rolls).

moves.name: Overclock Systems
moves.description: Once per scene, take one extra action this turn. At the end of the turn, take 2 Stun damage (bypassing armor).

moves.name: Emergency Self-Repair
moves.description: During Downtime, you can initiate repair protocols to remove all current Wound damage (cannot repair esoteric damage).

scout.name: Scout Track
scout.focus: Stealth, reconnaissance, and surgical elimination of key targets.

general_capabilities.name: Observe & Report Relay
general_capabilities.description: Transmit a compressed data packet to a pre-established recipient. On a 10+, it arrives instantly and intact. On a 7-9, it's delayed or corrupted.

general_capabilities.name: Full-Spectrum Sensory Package
general_capabilities.description: You have an advantage on all Alertness rolls.

augments.name: Stealth Weave
augments.description: Your chassis is coated in a non-reflective, sound-dampening material. You gain a +1 bonus to all Larceny (Stealth) rolls.

augments.name: Adaptive Mesh Camouflage
augments.description: When motionless for a full round, you become nearly invisible. Provides a minor bonus while moving.

augments.name: Blight-Hardened System
augments.description: You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.

augments.name: All-Terrain Mobility System
augments.description: You ignore all movement penalties from difficult or uneven terrain.

moves.name: Light-Bending Shroud (True Stealth)
moves.description: Activate a powerful stealth field. On a 10+, you are perfectly invisible for a full minute. On a 7-9, it's unstable and lasts only a few rounds.

moves.name: Kinetic Assassin Strike
moves.description: Spend a full turn shunting power. Your next melee attack automatically hits and deals a devastating +4 damage. The system then requires a cool down for the rest of the scene.

guardian.name: Guardian Track
guardian.focus: Threat detection, defense, and the protection of key assets or locations.

general_capabilities.name: Threat Detection
general_capabilities.description: Scan for hostile intent. On a 10+, you clearly detect the presence, number, and direction of any sentient being intending immediate violence.

general_capabilities.name: Biometric Registry
general_capabilities.description: After a full minute of scanning, you can 'register' an individual. At any point thereafter, you can use an action to unerringly know if they are on your registry.

augments.name: Sentry State
augments.description: You can enter a low-power meditative state. You do not need to eat or sleep and cannot be surprised by any physical ambush.

moves.name: Alert Relay System
moves.description: Once per scene, you can broadcast a high-priority distress signal. Any allied Automata within a 1km radius are immediately alerted to your location and combat status.

augments.name: Advanced Armor Plating
augments.description: Your Combat Hardening armor bonus increases to +2 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

moves.name: Deploy Sensor Web
moves.description: Deploy a swarm of nearly invisible micro-drones. On a 10+, you create a perfect surveillance network in a large area for the scene, psychically aware of any moving object larger than a cat.

imperial.name: The Imperial Aegis ('Shield of the Empire')

moves.name: Void Core Negation
moves.description: As a reaction when you or an adjacent ally are targeted by a direct supernatural ability, you can attempt to negate it with a Willpower roll.

moves.name: Field of Null
moves.description: As an action, project a 30-foot radius field of Aetheric interference for one minute. All supernatural Moves made within this field suffer a significant penalty.

laborer.name: Laborer Track
laborer.focus: Heavy industry, durability, and adaptable, on-the-job functionality.

general_capabilities.name: Rugged Construction (Durability)
general_capabilities.description: Your chassis is designed to withstand incredible punishment. You gain two additional Health Boxes on your Torso location.

augments.name: Simplified Systems (Repairability)
augments.description: Your parts are large and standardized. Repairs made to you during Downtime are faster and require less specialized materials.

augments.name: Adaptive Chassis
augments.description: Your body is a modular platform. You have two additional 'Hardpoint Slots' for modular 'loadouts', which can be swapped during Downtime.

augments.name: Blight-Sealed System (Blight Resistance)
augments.description: Your systems are hermetically sealed. You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.

augments.name: Combat Hardening
augments.description: You are built to withstand unexpected attacks. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

moves.name: [REDACTED PROTOCOL]
moves.description: When you encounter technology of Seraphim origin or a location of immense Aetheric sealing, you can access sealed orders from The Nine with a Willpower roll.

maintenance.name: Maintenance Track
maintenance.focus: Infrastructure, engineering, and the deep, hidden knowledge of Sidonia's inner workings.

general_capabilities.name: Access Schematics (City Infrastructure)
general_capabilities.description: Once per session, you can access your internal databanks for a detailed map or schematic of a piece of Sidonia's core municipal infrastructure in your current district.

general_capabilities.name: Integrated Toolkit
general_capabilities.description: Your chassis contains a comprehensive set of masterwork tools for mechanical and electrical repair, granting you a +1 bonus on such rolls when the tool is a factor.

augments.name: Environmental Sealing (Durability)
augments.description: You are designed to operate in the worst possible conditions. You are immune to damage and penalties from conventional environmental hazards like toxic gas or extreme temperatures.

moves.name: Aetheric Diagnostics (Adaptive Scan)
moves.description: Scan the Aetheric signature of a piece of technology. On a 10+, the GM tells you its precise function, power state, primary flaw, and Aetheric resonance.

augments.name: Master Craftsman (Problem Solving)
augments.description: Your processing core is a marvel of logical and intuitive engineering. You gain a permanent +1 bonus to all Engineering and Science rolls.

augments.name: Right of Repair (Aetheric Authority)
augments.description: You possess ancient, hard-coded access keys that are still recognized by Sidonia's automated core systems, allowing you to override municipal systems.
